file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-10-05-02 - MAIN LANDING GEAR SPRING CARTRIDGE - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL MAIN LANDING GEAR SPRING CARTRIDGE - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to restore the main landing gear spring assembly. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY MLG SPRING ASSEMBLY - RESTORA- ALL 32-10-05-900-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-10-05 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-10-05-900-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. MLG SPRING ASSEMBLY - RESTORATION A. General (1) Refer to the latest revision of Component Maintenance Manual EMBRAER T.P. 145/1191 to restore the MLG spring assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION SPRING ASSEMBLIES OF THE MAIN LANDING AMM TASK 32-10-05-000-801-A/400 GEAR - REMOVAL SPRING ASSEMBLIES OF THE MAIN LANDING AMM TASK 32-10-05-400-801-A/400 GEAR - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) Remove the MLG spring assembly ( AMM TASK 32-10-05-000-801-A/400). J. Restore MLG Spring (Figure 201) SUBTASK 900-003-A (1) Refer to the latest revision of the Component Maintenance Manual EMBRAER T.P. 145/1191 to restore the MLG spring assembly. K. Follow-on (Figure 201) SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Install the MLG spring assembly ( AMM TASK 32-10-05-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 32-10-05 Page 2 of 3 Rev 51 - Oct 31/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
